messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hello. We're at the Nelson Building and there's a man here with a gun who came into the board meeting.
Okay, you're at the Nelson Building?
Yes, on Balboa, 1311 Balboa.
Okay, where is he at right now?
He's in the boardroom.
Can you give me a description? What does he look like?
He's white, tall, kind of heavyset. He's wearing a blue shirt, I think.
Has he fired the weapon?
No, he hasn't fired it, but he pulled it out and said, 'You fired my wife!'
Okay, hold on. So, he's in the boardroom at the Nelson building?
Yes, some of the board members are out of the room, but there are still others inside.
Can you find out how many people are still in the boardroom?
Several of the board members and the superintendent, probably about four or five people.
Okay, so he's got about five people hostage in the boardroom?
Yes, he's holding them hostage. The rest of us ran out quickly.
Okay, I'm just updating my officers. What did he say about his wife again?
He said, 'You fired my wife,' then took out a gun and some spray paint and painted the wall. Most of us ran out after that.
All right. Do you have a policy in place for situations like this? Should people evacuate the building?
We're behind secure doors, but those doors aren't bulletproof.
If you can safely evacuate, do it. If it's safe to stay put, then do that. Is there a video feed of the boardroom?
Yes, we have a video of the boardroom. He doesn't know we're live, but we can see him. The superintendent and three board members are visible.
Are you watching him live on the video now?
Yes, we are near the video feed right now.
Okay, if you can safely evacuate, do so. Otherwise, stay put. Is the video room secured?
No, it's not a secure room, but everyone else is behind a secure area.
Okay, can you give me more details about the gunman from the video feed?
He's wearing blue jeans and a gray hoodie. He's holding the gun in his hand.
I want you to stay on the line with me, okay? Has he fired any shots?
Not yet. Oh my gosh, he's firing!
Stay calm. Do you know if anyone has been hit?
One of the board members is down. The gunman has also been shot.
Are the police there? Can you see them arriving on the video?
Yes, the police just came in. They are entering the boardroom now.
You're doing fine. Just stay with me, okay?
I'm okay. The police are here. They're securing the area.
